statements: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'clothing' AND stock_quantity < 50;
SELECT product_id, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY category ASC, price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 AND category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price >= 50 AND category <> 'Furniture' ORDER BY category, price;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, stock_quantity, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10 OR price < 20 ORDER BY stock_quantity, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price = 75;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, quantity FROM products JOIN stock_levels ON products.product_id = stock_levels.product_id;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products LEFT JOIN stock_levels ON products.product_id = stock_levels.product_id WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, price, stock_level FROM products WHERE price < 50 AND stock_level > 0 ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC, stock_level DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT products.product_name, suppliers.supplier_name, orders.quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, suppliers.supplier_name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory JOIN StockLevels ON Inventory.product_id = StockLevels.product_id ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.quantity, Orders.order_date FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE Orders.quantity > 5 ORDER BY Orders.order_date ASC;

SELECT Inventory.product_name, StockLevels.location, StockLevels.quantity FROM Inventory JOIN StockLevels ON Inventory.product_id = StockLevels.product_id WHERE StockLevels.quantity < 10 ORDER BY StockLevels.quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_level > 0 AND price < 100 ORDER BY category, price;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'USA' OR location = 'Canada';
SELECT id, order_date, status FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 500 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location='New York' AND contact_person='John Doe'
SELECT id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE status='Shipped' ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 3 ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT t.id, t.transaction_date, p.name, t.quantity, t.total_price FROM transactions t JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.id
